review_title: Online education at Hutchinson community college
job_title: Coordinator On Instructional Technology and Design in Hutchinson, KS
pros: Online education is well structured. Friendly coworkers, positive attitudes. Challenging and meaningful work.

review_title: 5 stars sliding to 3 yields an average of 4 stars
job_title: coordinator of library services in Hutchinson, KS
pros: The people, the students, great facilities, great faculty support, best in class tech department.
cons: Administration used to generally look out for and protect employees as well as supported active involvement in professional organizations and leadership within them. Many people have had the rug pulled out from under them in the past several years through no fault of their own.

pros:
Collaborative work environment 
Opportunities for input
cons: Pay scale far below market value

review_title: Not a bad place to work, but there is a need for improvement
pros:
I work days and get weekends off.

Benefits are wonderful. Health insurance is covered by the school separate from our pay, which helps.

Lots of vacation, holiday, and sick time. It's nice to work for a company that allows for some balance between work and life outside of work.
cons:
As a support staff, I get no respect from faculty. Most of them act like we are the enemy despite the fact that we are considered co-workers. There is a split between the instructors and the rest of the university. There is no unity and communication is a big problem. 

As support staff, there's little reason to stay here longer than a few years. It's not a good place to grow a career. I really wish they would increase our pay to accommodate the increase in cost of living.

Most of our processes are defunct. Everyone is the exception, no one is the rule. It makes our everyday processes very difficult and less efficient than if everyone were held to the rules and deadlines that are in place.

pros: Great individuals to work with. Excellent support staff and supervisors.
cons: The path to full time is not in place.

review_title: This is such a wonderful organization to be part of.
pros: It feels like everyday coming home to a family. That is the environment they impose.  Every day was new and inviting.
cons: I don't have any cons about this organization. This organization really does care about its students and staff on such a level that is hard to find.

job_title: Coordinator of Instructional Design and Technology in Hutchinson, KS
pros: Small department allows me to explore a wide range of tools and activities. Extremely friendly staff. Constant improvement of development process makes it a positive work experience.

review_title: A great job for a full-time student.
pros: Flexible hours for students. Work is based upon people being there who need tutored, so if no one is there, you are free to work on what you want. Great management.
cons: Pay wasn't great. Some training offered, but not much.

pros:
Amazing people & excellent work environment. 
I feel like I get to work on what fuels my passion and that my voice is heard.
cons: Health benefits are high for employees with a family.

pros: Flexible on Hours, Able to do homework when not busy
cons: Pay was not very good. Never really received a raise

review_title: Amazing people and excellent work environment.
cons: Wage and benefits lag behind private sector.

pros: Great place to work. Wonderful support system.
cons: Very hard to get a full time position.
Not enough hours and no benefits.
